Package com.flipkart.rest

Class ProfessorRESTAPI

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.rest.ProfessorRESTAPI
@Path("/professor")
public class ProfessorRESTAPI
extends java.lang.Object
Handles all Http requests related to professor operations Validators NotNull-checks for null values, Size checks for length of string and DecimalMin/DecimalMax checks for integer range
Author:
JEDI04
